name: holdover
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or thing that continues from an earlier time, especially a person who continues in an organization after other people have been replaced: The coach had a pointed message for newcomers to the team and a reminder for the holdovers. Freud explained it as a holdover from a childhood problem.
